Screenshot.Description: Gallio's Icarus GUI Runner displays the results of running a sample MbUnit test assembly.
Gallio's Icarus Runner displaying the Gallio Test Report results.
Gallio supports many frameworks, tools and runners as seen by the components available in the installer.

Screenshot.AltText: Running tests from command line using Echo.
Screenshot.Description: Gallio.Echo.exe is a command line test runner. It has a progress monitor which gives you feedback about the status of a test run. Additionally, it allows you to specify the destination and format (say xml, mht, etc.) of your results. Use plugins to generate customized reports and charts.

Screenshot.AltText: Running tests in Visual Studio with ReSharper.
Screenshot.Description: Gallio's test runner is integrated with ReSharper's Unit Test Runner. When you open any test inside Visual Studio it presents you a green and yellow circle adjacent to test. Left-Click to open up a pane which presents you a list of actions. Apart from running/debugging a test, it allows you to create sessions of tests from different fixtures. These sessions can be stored and you can run them.

Screenshot.AltText: Viewing test report in Visual Studio with ReSharper.
Screenshot.Description: Gallio's test runner extends ReSharper's Unit Test Runner to provide an option to display a Gallio test report. The report contains links on test and in stack traces which navigate directly to the displayed location right inside Visual Studio.
